name: Mera kuchupuchu babygirl
greetingText:
So apparently itâ€™s Valentineâ€™s Day and Iâ€™m writing you a digital letter because apparently we require addresses for physical things.
Anyway. 

I like you.....wait I like you? OMG wait I might just love you. Like love-love you??? WHAT even!? 

Things I might not always be able to say â€” 

you calm me; 

And somehow you feel like home after a vacation, 

Like coming back and finally exhaling; 

I like us, how we just fit together; 

How Iâ€™m staying (and waiting patiently ke Maharaj kab aaenge) 

How choosing you feels natural, as if you always belonged with me!!! 

Also yes, full disclosure: I fully intend to brainwash you into loving me forever. And this is a threat!!! 

Okay bas. 

Before I overthink this and ruin the moment, 

Happy Valentineâ€™s Day mera kuchupuchu aloo paratha muaahhhh 

Babe, are you the French Revolution?
Because I am losing my head over you. ðŸ˜šðŸ’—
wishText:
Main tenu samjhawan ki
Na tere bina lagda ji,
Tu ki jaane pyaar mera
Main karun intezar tera
Tu dil tui yon jaan meri
